pullrequest.title: Fixed cppcheck warnings in tiny_obj_loader.h and upgrade to latest upstream

content.raw:
Here are the 10 fixed warnings:

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64/23/cppcheckResult/

I wonder if we should care about these though, since they come from a 3rd party library. We could probably just tell the style checker to ignore such files, I believe that's what we do in Gazebo.
content.html:
Here are the 10 fixed warnings:

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64/23/cppcheckResult/

I wonder if we should care about these though, since they come from a 3rd party library. We could probably just tell the style checker to ignore such files, I believe that's what we do in Gazebo.
